mapper.select: select perk0,perk_sub_style from rune_page where pk_rune_page = #{pkRunePage}
mapper.insert:
select seq_runepage.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into rune_page values( seq_runepage.currval, #{championInfoKey}, #{matchId}, #{perk0}, #{perk0Var1}, #{perk0Var2}, #{perk0Var3}, #{perk1}, #{perk1Var1}, #{perk1Var2}, #{perk1Var3}, #{perk2}, #{perk2Var1}, #{perk2Var2}, #{perk2Var3}, #{perk3}, #{perk3Var1}, #{perk3Var2}, #{perk3Var3}, #{perk4}, #{perk4Var1}, #{perk4Var2}, #{perk4Var3}, #{perk5}, #{perk5Var1}, #{perk5Var2}, #{perk5Var3}, #{perkPrimaryStyle}, #{perkSubStyle}, #{statPerk0}, #{statPerk1}, #{statPerk2} )
